channel.title: Ubuntu
channel.description: Hey, i've recently installed ubuntu onto my laptop, but for some unknown reason the connection isn't working (internet) i've added a connection, and even wired it. But yet the internet works on windows vista and on my computer + xbox. Any help would be great.

item.title: Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Yeah, there has always been a major issue with WLAN and Ubuntu, you just need proper up to date drivers like T4_ said.
I am suprised you did not get a wired connection working though- ethernet is ethernet!

My Ethrros AR5007EG card seems to work on Kubuntu 9.04 out of the box. Are you running 9.10?

Read full topic

item.title: Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

I guarantee you don’t have a proper driver for said hardware or you didn’t bring the interface up.

Read full topic

item.title: Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

your going to need to be more specific and did you try the ubuntu forums they are quite helpful.

The internet is working for all my other items/OS’s. But not for ubuntu, its all the correct infomation in it yet it says “offline”. And i just posted there.

Read full topic
